title: Tofu vindaloo
ingredients: ['450g extra firm tofu, cut into 2.5cm cubes', '1/2 head cauliflower, separated into florets', '3 medium carrots, peeled and sliced', '2 onions, halved and sliced', '200g mushrooms, sliced', '5cm piece of ginger, peeled and finely chopped', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, rinsed', '1 (400g) tin coconut milk', '6 tablespoons tomato puree', '225ml vegetable stock', '3 tablespoons good quality Vindaloo paste', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'salt to taste']
